TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ResourceNamePropertyResolver extends Azure.Provisioning.Primitives.InfrastructureResolver
Public MustInherit Class ResourceNamePropertyResolver Inherits InfrastructureResolver

Docs.summary: Provides a strategy for resolving Azure names using their resource name as a prefix, the set of valid characters, the max length allowed, and an optional min length.
Docs.remarks:
You can learn more about Azure's resource naming rules at
https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/azure-resource-manager/management/resource-name-rules .

MemberSignature.Value: protected static string SanitizeText (string text, Azure.Provisioning.Primitives.ResourceNameCharacters validCharacters);
.method familystatic hidebysig string SanitizeText(string text, valuetype Azure.Provisioning.Primitives.ResourceNameCharacters validCharacters) cil managed
Protected Shared Function SanitizeText (text As String, validCharacters As ResourceNameCharacters) As String

Docs.param: The set of characters that will be appended.
Docs.summary: Get a sanitized version of the given text according to the set of valid characters. Case will be changed as needed, but any other invalid characters are ignored.
Docs.returns: A sanitized version of the text.
